alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 7:24AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Wilkes and northeastern Jefferson Counties through 745 AM EDT... At 724 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Floral Hill, or 10 miles northeast of Washington, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Matthews, Delhi, Danburg, Stellaville, Metasville, Floral Hill and Holliday Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
